containerDefinitions.name: sql-fix
command:
echo 'import asyncio, asyncpg, os
url = os.environ["DATABASE_URL"].replace("postgresql+asyncpg://", "postgresql://")
async def run():
    conn = await asyncpg.connect(url)
    print("Connected to database")
    await conn.execute("ALTER TABLE patients ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS cancellation_count_90d INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0")
    print("Added cancellation_count_90d")
    await conn.execute("ALTER TABLE patients ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS no_show_count_90d INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0")
    print("Added no_show_count_90d")
    await conn.execute("ALTER TABLE patients ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS last_behavior_reset_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE")
    print("Added last_behavior_reset_at")
    await conn.close()
    print("Migration complete")
asyncio.run(run())' > /tmp/fix.py && python /tmp/fix.py
